name: Vendor Onboarding Form
description: Form for print shop administrators to provide details, upload vendors, and provide feedback on RFQ workflow.

sections.title: Vendor Onboarding Section
sections.description: Complete this section to onboard your print shop and vendors.

questions.title: Print Shop InfoFlo Print System URL:
questions.label: Print Shop InfoFlo Print System URL:

questions.title: Do you already have a Card Connect or Fiserv Account?
questions.label: Do you already have a Card Connect or Fiserv Account?

questions.label: Please enter your Card Connect or Fiserv MID:

questions.title: Please select the Payment Types you would like to Setup:
questions.label: Please select the Payment Types you would like to Setup:

questions.title: Who is your current Payment Processor Merchant? What is your current rate?
questions.label: Who is your current Payment Processor Merchant? What is your current rate?

questions.title: Do you have an estimate of your monthly processing volume? If yes, please enter it below.
questions.label: Do you have an estimate of your monthly processing volume? If yes, please enter it below.

questions.title: Do you occasionally process transactions that significantly exceed your typical invoice amounts? For example, if your average invoices range from $500 to $5,000, do you sometimes receive orders between $20,000 and $60,000?
questions.label: Do you occasionally process transactions that significantly exceed your typical invoice amounts? For example, if your average invoices range from $500 to $5,000, do you sometimes receive orders between $20,000 and $60,000?
